title: Designing Science-Integrated Library Classes in Remote Education: Blended Learning and Scaffolding Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Off-hour learning for working professionals in BYOD environments, requiring enhanced library resource utilization competencies during science research projects

learning_goals: Learners can search for academic resources suitable for scientific research topics using at least three search strategies in a remote environment.
Learners can apply a 4-stage scaffolding (Introduction-Exploration-Application-Evaluation) module based on a blended learning model to PBL projects.
Learners can judge the credibility of scientific information with over 80% accuracy by combining digital literacy and information evaluation competencies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
